title: 346: Overstaying a Celebrity’s Welcome & Moldy Burrata
itunes:title: 346: Overstaying a Celebrity’s Welcome & Moldy Burrata
description:
Prepare for a lot of cringing and The Broads cry laughing in the second half of this episode when Jess discusses her celebrity encounter - BUT first The Broads wax on about childhood food favorites, their culinary palates, chronic candida issues, Bekah’s Michelin star restaurant experience, cruise ship nightmares, and dynamics of friend trips and the drama. Then Jess tells the embarrassing tale of her hoped to be noteworthy night turned awkward encounter at a celebrity’s house. YIKES. Then they chat kids swearing and Jess’ daughter getting in trouble for certain drawings - cheers!
